article_title: Swiss Authorities Order Freeze of Assets Related to Petrobras Scandal
article_text:
ZURICH—Swiss authorities say they have frozen hundreds of millions of dollars in assets tied to a corruption scandal at Petróleo Brasileiro SA, and have unearthed hundreds of accounts at Switzerland’s banks used to funnel bribes as part of the alleged wrongdoing at Brazil’s state oil company.

In a statement on Wednesday, Switzerland’s Office of the Attorney General said it has ordered the freezing of roughly $400 million in assets related to the scandal at Petrobras, and that ongoing probes have identified more than 300...

ZURICH—Swiss authorities say they have frozen hundreds of millions of dollars in assets tied to a corruption scandal at Petróleo Brasileiro SA, and have unearthed hundreds of accounts at Switzerland’s banks used to funnel bribes as part of the alleged wrongdoing at Brazil’s state oil company.
